summary: This document outlines policy guidance directives for Cuban intelligence representatives in the Dominican Republic, prepared by the General Directorate of Intelligence (DGI). It prioritizes information gathering on collective action against Cuba, the status of leftist forces, the Dominican Republic Armed Forces, the Dominican Communist Party, training camps, counterrevolutionary organizations, repressive corps, CIA Santo Domingo, political parties, solidarity with Cuba movement, relations with the United States, the Church, and internal situation of the armed forces.
title: Policy Guidance Directives for Cuban Intelligence Representatives in the Dominican Republic
sender: General Directorate of Intelligence (Direccion General de Inteligencia--DGI)
